text: Nizhneye Sazovo () is a rural locality (a village) in Maxyutovsky Selsoviet, Kugarchinsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 59 as of 2010. There is 1 street. == Geography == It is located 42 km from Mrakovo, 8 km from Maxyutovo. == References == Category:Rural localities in Kugarchinsky District
title: Nizhneye Sazovo
